forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 55, with temperatures rising to around 63 overnight. Southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
